lines.text: Let us be thankful we have commerce. Buy more. Buy more now. Buy. And be happy.
If you feel you are not properly sedated, call 348-844 immediately. Failure to do so may result in prosecution for criminal drug evasion.
Blessings of the state, blessings of the masses.
Hey, I think I ran over some - I think I ran over a wookie back there on the expressway...
Changeable. Alterable. Mutable. Variable. Versatile. Moldable. Movable. Fluctuate. Undulate. Flicker. Flutter. Pulsate. Vibrate. Alternate. Plastic.
[THX is approaching the city's exit]
Please come back. You have nothing to be afraid of.
[last lines]
We have to go back. This is your last chance to return with us. You have nowhere to go. You cannot survive outside the city shell. We only want to help you. This is your last chance.
How shall the new environment be programmed? It all happened so slowly that most men failed to realize that anything had happened at all.
What's wrong?
I need something stronger.
Take four red capsules. In 10 minutes, take two more. Help is on the way.
Everything will be all right. You are in my hands. I am here to protect you. You have nowhere to go. You have nowhere to go.

[trying to unlock door to pursue THX]
Can you hear me? Stay calm. Everything will be all right. The door seems to be jammed. Please check the lock on your side. Everything will be all right; we are here to help you. Stay calm. We are not going to harm you. Everything will be all right.
The T-H-X account is six percent over budget. The case is to be terminated.

[Final words]
We have to go back. This is your last chance to return with us. You have nowhere to go. You cannot survive outside the city shell. We only want to help you. This is your last chance.
Let us be thankful we have an occupation to fill. Work hard, increase production, prevent accidents and be happy.
You have nowhere to go. I am here to protect you.
[repeated line]
Are you now, or have you ever been?
What's wrong?
I just bought one of these yesterday, and it doesn't fit my consumer, and the store doesn't have any of the other kind.
[LUH presses a button]
For more enjoyment and greater efficiency, consumption is being standardized. We are sorry...
This is -
[cut off]
That accident over in Red Sector L destroyed another 63 personnel, giving them a total of 242 lost to our 195. Keep up the good work and prevent accidents. This shift is concluded.
A libido leveler has been mislaid near the pulse-leveling gate. If you have accidentally...
...units of detuned escalatories have not, however, prevented virus and ordnance from invading our centers.
[hologram plays in background while THX looks for LUH]

Combined with economic advantages of the mating structure, it far surpasses any disadvantages in increased perversions. A final tran - An infinite translated mathematics of tolerance and charity among artificial memory devices is ultimately binary. Stimulating rhetoric...
LUH?
...absolute. The theater of noise is proof of our potential. The circulation of autotypes. The golden talisman underfoot is phenomenon approaching. And, in the history of now, all ethos are designed.
He must be destroyed! We must not continue to consume these erotics. We must exterminate the source of sin. Economics must not dictate situations which are obviously religious.
Masses won. Defendant used, not destroyed. Case rest.
[in crowded hallway]
Keep causeways clean. Save time, save lives.
Remember, thrifty thinkers are always under budget.
Economics make it necessary to terminate any operation which exceeds five percent of its primary budget.

[kneeling in a studio before a large image of OMM]
Things don't seem to make sense. Sometimes I see things get left out, and... they don't fit. People don't seem to see them. Or they don't know what to do. Sometimes I - Sometimes a little - a little adjustment -
[laughs]
This is no place for prayer. If you want to speak to OMM, you must go to a unichapel. You know that.
Yes.
What? Are you in any trouble?
No, I - I'm okay, I'm going now.
What's your number and what's your prefix? I'm going to see this gets into your report.

[stammering]
No, I'm leaving now.
I'm sorry, I - I have to report all intruders. Uh, where's your identification badge?
I... lost it.
You're in violation. I'm gonna have to report you to the authorities.

Well, maybe you are right. Maybe there's something wrong with the computer. I don't know, it's a strange life. Cybernetics, genetics, lasers and all those things. I guess I'll never understand any of that stuff. Guess maybe holograms are not supposed to.
six thousand credits under budget. Congratulations. Be efficient, be happy.
You know, when I was at school, it was all very different. We used to stay in bed all the time. Combined primary economics... Combined primary economics was a bottle about this big.
[holds hands two feet apart]
Took a week.
Wow!

...in your zoned section for longer than three minutes. Jet acceleration will not be safe to persons in dispersal area. To avoid being singed by jet exhaust, please exit your vehicle on the right, and walk through the blue zone on the left.
...critical noise levels in this area. Be sure to report all decibel surges in excess of 1.5 on the Murrer-Wiggins scale.
Thou art a subject of the divine, created in the image of man, by the masses, for the masses.
Who are you?
I am a hologram.
[first lines]
What's wrong?
Nothing. Nothing really. I just feel that I need something stronger.
If you have a problem, don't hesitate to ask for assistance.
Yes, thank you, I'll be alright.
Performance perfect is perfect performance.

[Meeting THX and SEN]
Hello. Uh, where'd you guys come from?
[THX and SEN don't speak]
Oh well, it doesn't make any difference, I guess.
[SRT notices SEN's food]
Uh, is that food? I'm starving. Do you mind?
How did you get here?
I was lost.
You're not lost now?

[Eating with his mouth full]
Uh-uh.
You know the way out?

[Chewing]
Um hmm.
[swallows]
That's the way out.
[He points in the direction from which THX and SEN have just come]
Well that's the way we just came.
Yeah, but maybe you were traveling around in circles see, 'cause that's the way out.
[SRT points behind them again]
How do you know?

[Pointing]
Well look. Look more closely. You see? Come on.
[SRT walks in the direction he was pointing and the other two follow]
Oh yeah.
[laughs]
I think I'm dying.
Could you be more - specific?
[THX vomits]
You are a true believer. Blessings of the state. Blessings of the masses...
My time - is yours. Go ahead.
What's wrong with me? What am I to her, she to me? Nothing!
Yes, fine.
Just an ordinary roommate. I share rooms with her. Our relationship is normal. Conforming.
Excellent!
We share nothing - but space. What is she doing to me?
Yes, I understand.

[THX is looking at a screen that says LUH has been "consumed" and her name has been reassigned to a bottled fetus]
Well, either this thing has gone nuts, or that's your roommate.
What have you done to LUH? She was here.

We - had a long talk and - she agreed that it would be better for both of you to switch. She seemed to think that you weren't accurately mated with her in the first place. I'll never have another mate like O-N-A. You rate very high in sanitation. I've checked.
I don't feel well.
[Leaves abruptly]
We'll be happy!
What's going on?
I want you for my roommate. We'll be very good for one another.
I don't understand? Living - Living selection is computed.
I know what you're thinking. Program shifting isn't that major a crime, is it?
You're in violation.
I was so afraid. So alone. I wanted to touch you so many times.
Are you all right? What did they do to you? What? What?
I'm going to have a child. Hold me. Hold me.
Our differences are differences of emphasis.

[prison]
I want an idea that is clear, simple and plain as the nose on your face!
[another prisoner punches him in the nose]

[a prisoner jumps repeatedly on a downed robot]
Now that's what I call the wrong idea.
I don't understand, what happened to LUH, she was here.
You know I've always had a way with computers.
I don't know. All that stuff, cybernetics, genetics, I don't understand it. I guess holograms aren't meant to.
Do you know you're perspiring? It's not exactly warm in here.

[Prison]
Do you know how many times I've listened to that speech? Do you KNOW how many TIMES I've listened to THAT SPEECH?

[has found the TV Studio with the photograph of OMM, and is talking to it]
Sometimes a little adjustment makes all the difference. I'm going to go back.
THX? - THX? - THX, is that you?
Will someone stop the Mindlock?
Where did you get that car?
I was just issued it! I took it out and drove straight through a crowd at the dispersal centre.
[laughter]
Oh, that's terrible. Terrible!
No, it's wonderful. Because my hand, it was paralysed anyway!
[laughter]
Keep up production and prevent accidents. This shift is concluded.
Do you know there are no insides to these people?
[pretending to be a corpse. Howls with pain and runs off when a tag is clipped to his ear]

[THX opens medicine cabinet and faints]
What's wrong? - What's wrong? - What's wrong? - What's wrong? What's wrong? - What's wrong? - What's wrong? - What's wrong?
[LUH enters]
Never mind!
[LUH slams shut the medicine chest]
We're picking up some illegal sexual activity.

[dead insect]
We found this in the batching cells. We killed it.
Thank you for your concern. A visual record is being taken.
Drug Evasion. Malicious Sexual Perversion and Transgression.
Immediate destruction! On the basis of an Echo TRX 314. Totally incurable chemical imbalance with socially deteriorating...
Reject! Reject! Inefficient, unwarranted, destruction. Must be saved!
If allowed these erotics to exist...
Inane. Inane. What is the prosecution doing?
Can you get him from where you are?
[the other robot shocks THX with a cattle-prod]
My mate, has been acting very strange. I can't explain it.
Yes.
I haven't been feeling very well myself.
Yes. I understand.
I don't know, maybe it's me?
Yes, fine.
I feel as if something...
Excellent.
odd were happening to me. Something that...
Yes?
I can't understand.
Could you be more - specific?
The sedatives.
They know. They've been watching us. I can feel it.
No one knows.
They're watching us, now.
No one can see us.
If you go back on sedation, you won't feel the same way about me. You'll report me for drug violation.
It can't go on forever. You know it can't.
We could leave - and live in the Super Structure. You only have one more shift left, don't you?
What are you doing here? You're not cleared for this area.
You know I have a way with computers. I can program myself for any area, almost.
I'll report you.
I don't feel well.
THX, you are entering a Critical Phase.
Make the correction, THX.
